scripts.install:apps: npm --prefix apps/static-landing install && npm --prefix apps/frontend-react install && npm --prefix apps/frontend-vue install && npm --prefix apps/backend-api install
scripts.lint:fallback: npm --prefix apps/frontend-react run lint && npm --prefix apps/frontend-vue run lint && npm --prefix apps/static-landing run lint --if-present && npm --prefix apps/backend-api run lint
scripts.build:fallback: npm --prefix apps/static-landing run build && npm --prefix apps/frontend-react run build && npm --prefix apps/frontend-vue run build && npm --prefix apps/backend-api run build
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix apps/backend-api && npm run test:coverage --prefix apps/frontend-react && npm run test:coverage --prefix apps/frontend-vue
